nodes.text: Egmont UK Ltd is an English children's book publisher, which also publishes official Star Wars publications in Poland. Its Star Wars publications include the UK editions of various young reader novels, such as Lost Stars, plus other young readers books like the Star Wars Joke Book and Star Wars: Where's the Wookiee? Colouring Book. They also publish many different Star Wars magazines across the UK, which include the ongoing Star Wars Rebels Magazine, Star Wars Adventures magazine and the Lego Star Wars Magazine.
